summary: The website has a missing meta description, which can negatively impact search engine visibility and click-through rates. Addressing this issue will enhance the site's SEO performance.

top_issues.why_it_matters: Meta descriptions help improve search engine rankings and attract clicks from users.
top_issues.evidence: The homepage at https://example.com/ lacks a meta description.

recommended_actions.action: Add a meta description to the homepage
Review and optimize meta descriptions for other pages
Conduct a full SEO audit to identify additional issues
Educate the team on the importance of meta tags

quick_wins: Add a relevant meta description to the homepage
Ensure all pages have unique meta descriptions
Use tools to check for missing meta tags regularly
